How to use

Reference all color variables with one line of code.

@import file required!

All individual Sass files using color variables require a file import of x1-ui-bootstrap/dist/app/src/x1-ui-sass-tools.scss from you bower component directory.

		@import "../../x1-ui-bootstrap/dist/app/src/x1-ui-sass-tools.scss";

Color palette

Search by variable name or hex value to filter the color swatches below.

{{color.variable}} {{color.hex}}
